Description:
Brand New Designer Style Townhouse With Own Street Frontage
This beautiful architecturally designed double storey modern town residence offers great value located in a convenient locale within minutes of Clayton central and Community Centre (Swimming Centre and Library), schools, train station and buses. Comprising formal living room, large dining and family area opening to private landscaped courtyard, 3 large robed bedrooms, and ensuite to main, stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, contemporary central bathroom - 3 bathrooms & 3 toilets in total, ducted heating and cooling, remote single lockup garage, water tanks and landscaped garden surrounds.

Description:
A Vintage Advantage
Boasting only one caring owner since brand new, this fantastic 1970's home has the space and flexible floor plan modern properties can only dream of. With charming topiary cottage gardens and solid brick construction, this bright home is located on a peaceful street in a boutique development. Relax and entertain easily in your lounge and dining zone, enhanced by picture windows and carpeting. Prepare meals in the family-sized kitchen, featuring plentiful tiled bench space, practical storage, pantry and convenient breakfast bar. Enjoy summertime BBQ's outside in the paved, undercover alfresco meals area surrounded by mature plantings. Sleep soundly in any of the three sunny bedrooms, all with built-in-robes and neighbourhood views. A central bathroom services the whole home, featuring safety-conscious Altro flooring, shower, separate WC and natural ventilation. Other benefits of this quality home include air conditioning, gas heater, sun-protectant awnings, handyman shed, single car carport and space for another vehicle on-site. So close to local primary and high schools, parklands, Clayton train station and shopping centres this well-loved vintage home offers you a comfortable future.
Additional Info:
Land Size: 400m2 approx
House Size: 10 squares approx
Age of property: 40 years approx
Heating: Gas Central Unit
Cooling: Split System Cooling
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days
Potential Rental Return: $320-$360 per week approx
What the owners love about the property: Large rear unit, great sized back yard with magnificent gardens, open plan living, close to all Clayton has to offer.
Nearest Primary Schools: Clayton South, St Andrews, Westall, Clarinda, Huntingdale & Oakleigh South.
Nearest Secondary Schools: Heatherton Christian College, South Oakleigh Secondary College & Minaret College.
Nearest Kindergartens: ABC Clarinda, Sundowner, Tootal's Corner Childcare & Kindergarten, Westall, Kallay Street Pre-School.
Nearest Transport:
Train: Huntingdale (Zone 1), Clayton & Westall Train Stations (Cranbourne, Pakenham & City Loop lines)
Bus Route: 631 Southland S/C Waverly Gardens S/C via Clayton, 705 Mordialloc Springvale via Clayton South, 821 Southland S/C Clayton via Heatherton, 824 Moorabbin Keysborough.
Nearest Recreation: Clarinda Community Centre, Clayton Aquatics & Health Club, Several Golf Clubs and Libraries, Namatjira Reserve, Sandown Racecourse, Mentone Beach, Kids Space
Other Amenities: Australia Post, Newsagency, Pharmacy, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Woolworths, Coles, Bunnings Warehouse, Monash Freeway, Chadstone Shopping Centre (Largest shopping centre in the southern hemisphere with over 530 stores inc Myer, Kmart, David Jones etc).

Description:
Brand New Apartment, Massive Savings!
Situated within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shopping Strip, and only minutes from Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, this beautiful brand new 2 bedroom apartment featuring master bedroom with ensuite, air conditioning and heating, down lights throughout, wall to ceiling tiled bathrooms, modern kitchen with stainless steel oven, range hood and cook top, beautiful glass splash back, dishwasher, carpeted bedrooms, balcony with front terrace and landscaped garden and secure intercom entry from front gate.
Underground car parking, rear storage shed and much much more.
With the newly constructed IKEA and Harvey Norman superstores on the way, less than 5 minutes away, you cannot find a better growth location!
Massive government grants of up to $20,000 available to eligible first home owners, be quick to take advantage!

Description:
A Picture of Family Pride
Loved by its one owner since it was built in the 1960's, what you see is what you get, a quality family home. Enjoying timber boards throughout, it offers sunlit living/dining, spacious bedrooms and neatly presented kitchen and bathroom. With the added bonus of some space out the back, you've the opportunity to update this home to your taste or live comfortably within its well maintained indoor/outdoor zones. A short walk to schools, shops, trains and Keeley Park, this home's got a bright future.

Description:
Price Reduction. Vendor Says Sell!!
Family home or great investment opportunity. This property offers 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. It has been very well cared for with all maintenance done and not a dollar to spend. Your tenants could just move in and start paying the mortgage for you. The expected rental return would be between $550.00 and $600.00 per week.
Alternatively, what a great family home to move in to yourself with accommodation for the in-laws, or the teenager who is quickly growing up, offering those often desired for separate living areas. There are many extras attached to this home including a fabulous outdoor entertaining area for all seasons. Don't miss this one, come along and have a look on the weekend at the Open House or ring the office and make an appointment.
All enquiries Abba Khaimov on 0403 493 680.

Description:
Fantastic Opportunity! Spacious, Comfortable And Low Maintenance!
With easy access to Clayton shopping village, Clayton Train Station, Westall Train Station, this spacious three bedroom brick veneer home approximately 5 years new, provides for both the home buyer and astute investor offering luxurious low maintenance living.
Comprising: Huge open-plan lounge area with down lights, beautiful floorboards throughout, three spacious bedrooms with robes (master bedroom with Ensuite and walk-in-robes), two bathrooms, two toilets, and separate laundry.
Features: Single carport and extra car space, ducted heating, kitchen with gas appliances, spacious meals area, large paved courtyard great for entertaining and a storage shed.
Tenants on a month-to-month lease at $1600pcm approx.

Description:
Character & Charm
Experience the warmth and appeal of this inviting home which offers, two large bedrooms and a 3rd which has been converted into a sizeable dining room. A lounge room that exudes warmth with polished timber floors, Coonara wood heater and neutral tones. A studio or extra bedroom is fully insulated, re-wired with new plastered walls, new windows, TV and phone connections, as well as a digital aerial. A large decking off the rear of the property offers great entertaining space with quality cafe blinds to keep the elements at bay. Beautifully landscaped gardens in both front and back, with period features such as a bullnose veranda and deck at the entry.
Other Features include; Approx 596 sqm, driveway space for multiple cars, 6100 ltr water tank, north facing, modern updated kitchen with gas cooktop, re-stumped, ducted heating, A/C, timber venetians, bus stops at the end of the street, a park at the other end and walking distance to Clayton shops & train station.

Description:
Fulfil Its Potential!
Act in haste for this brilliant piece of real estate that offers multiple possibilities. With land measuring 697m2 (approx) and being close to Westall Primary & High Schools, Westall Train Station, shopping and parks, utilize 42 Main Road as a first home, rental investment or dual occupancy site (STCA).
The weatherboard cladding home comprises of: 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom & 2 showers, separate lounge, separate dining, kitchen & meals area and currently rented out at a generous $350 per week.
Add this to your must see list. You won’t find many more prudent purchases than this in our local market, so get in now! Contact further for more information!

Description:
Brick House On 690M2 Of Endless Possibilities!
Get ready for this fantastic property set on a large 690sqm of prime real estate within walking distance to Westall Train Station. With huge potential for development, this ideal brick residence will get the blood boiling in any builders, developers and investors.
Featuring an original condition brick property with 3 large bedrooms all with BIRs, master bedroom with ensuite, L-shaped lounge room, central open plan kitchen leading onto the family room, central bathroom, double carport, large back yard, all set on a huge block of land, what are you waiting for?
Land size: 16.19m x 42.67m = 690sqm approx.

Description:
Amazing Home, Close to Everything
Fantastic opportunity arises for the home buyer or investor looking for a large 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom & study brick veneer residence in one of Clayton South's most popular streets.
Situated within short distance to Westall Train Station, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping Centre and the building in progress IKEA, the location is highly sought after with phenomenal growth potential.
Featuring high ceilings throughout, 3 large bedrooms of which 2 features ensuite, WIR, floorboards, study with built in cupboard and bookshelves, premium modern kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, gas cooking, dishwasher, gas hot water system, heating/cooling, quality window furnishings, water tank and double carport.
Still has 6 years approx building warranty left not to mention the tax depreciation potential left being only approx 6 month old.
Be first to inspect to ensure you capture this fantastic opportunity before it's sold!

Description:
Sold by Billy Chang 0423 010 737 of Ray White Ashburton.
This young quality architect designed townhouse offers you a comfortable modern and low maintenance living. Massive 25.33 sq (approx) building area includes three good size bedrooms and three living areas (All bedrooms with BIR and master bedroom with Ensuite). Designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and stone island bench top, open to a bright family area connected to the private backyard, timber floor, guest toilet downstairs, rear street double garage set with remote control door and storage area, central heating and cooling system has been efficiently divided to upstairs zone and downstairs zone. Skylight, water tank, all comes to 6 star energy rating living style.
Fantastic location: only a stone throw to Westall Train Station, minutes walk to shops on Rosebank Avenue, post office primary School and College. Short drive to Clayton shopping centre, Springvale shopping centre, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and Monash Free Way. Luckily there is a new IKEA on Princess Highway opening soon so you can deck out your new home. Great opportunity for first home buyer or investor. Just settle and enjoy.
Insights: 48 Botanic Drive, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2011 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.
